title: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum
summary: Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum (Arabic: محمد بن راشد آل مكتوم‎; Muḥammad bin Rāshid ʾĀl Maktūm; born 15 July 1949) is the Vice President and Prime Minister of the United Arab Emirates (UAE), its Minister of Defence, and ruler of the Emirate of Dubai.[1] He succeeded his brother Maktoum bin Rashid Al Maktoum as the ruler of Dubai in 2006 after his death.[2]
